performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This event terminates here. We wish you the best with your onward musical journey!
Passengers are reminded to remain hydrated at all times and shower the DJ with good vibes and your emotes at frequent intervals.
We're now on Bluesky! Follow us @bassstationvr.bsky.social
